BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Esql compare nanos and millis (#118027) Resolves #116281 Introduces support for comparing millisecond dates with nanosecond dates, without the need for casting. Millisecond dates outside of the nanosecond date range are handled correctly.
